response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs. This product, valued at $1,000,000 to you, holds immense significance and potential for growth and success. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that you not only maximize the value of your investment but also benefit from its unparalleled features and capabilities. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 950000}
